zapteryx.name: Max
zapteryx.statement: Hey! I'm Max, and I love working on cool stuff. I'm a full-stack developer, and I'm always looking for new things to learn.

ashiepleb.name: Ashley
ashiepleb.statement: Hi there! My name is Ashley, and I'm a full-stack developer based in England. I'm always eager to learn new programming languages and keep up with the latest trends in the tech industry.

xayanide.name: Xay
xayanide.statement: Hi, I'm Xay from the Philippines! I like contributing code on various open source projects I find interesting!
